Translations.Text: Their security during winter and summer journeys
Let them worship the Lord of this House
Who has fed them against hunger, and has secured them against fear
Have you considered him who denies the religion
It is he who mistreats the orphan
And does not encourage the feeding of the poor
So woe to those who pray
Those who are heedless of their prayers
Those who put on the appearance
So pray to your Lord and sacrifice
He who hates you is the loser
